hotels.name: Constance Prince Maurice
hotels.desc: Beachfront luxury resort, Indian Ocean paradise, exclusive island escape, gourmet dining
hotels.longDesc: A distinguished beachfront resort in Mauritius offering luxurious accommodations and fine dining with stunning ocean vistas.

hotels.name: Labourdonnais Waterfront Hotel
hotels.desc: Beachfront colonial charm, rooftop pool, historic waterfront location
hotels.longDesc: A restored 19th-century mansion overlooking the harbor, perfect for families seeking authentic Mauritian elegance with modern comforts and easy city access.

hotels.name: Veranda Paul et Virginie Hotel & Spa
hotels.desc: Boutique beachfront resort, laid-back tropical vibe, water sports access
hotels.longDesc: Intimate family-run resort on a pristine northern beach with water sports, kids' clubs, and a relaxed atmosphere ideal for beach-loving families.
hotels.photoAttribution: Veranda Paul et Virginie Hotel & Spa

hotels.name: Tamassa Bel Ombre
hotels.desc: All-inclusive family resort, south coast beaches, kids' clubs, water activities
hotels.longDesc: All-inclusive beachfront resort perfect for families with multiple pools, kids' activities, and direct beach access on the quieter south coast.

hotels.name: Hibiscus Boutique Hotel

experiences.name: Mauritius
experiences.desc: Quiet beaches, lush landscapes, 28Â°C sunshine in shoulder season
experiences.longDesc: Enjoy Mauritius during shoulder season with serene quiet beaches, verdant lush landscapes, and warm 28Â°C sunshine.

experiences.name: Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam Botanical Garden
experiences.desc: Historic botanical gardens, giant water lilies, tropical plants, peaceful setting
experiences.longDesc: Beautiful historic gardens showcasing exotic tropical plants and giant water lilies, perfect for a leisurely family stroll and nature photography.

experiences.name: Chamarel Seven Colored Earth Geopark
experiences.desc: Dramatic waterfall, unique geological formation, scenic walking trails
experiences.longDesc: Stunning natural attraction featuring a 100-meter waterfall and rare rainbow-hued mineral earth, ideal for family hikes and breathtaking photo opportunities.

experiences.name: Black River Gorges National Park
experiences.desc: Lush national park, hiking trails, endemic wildlife, mountain views
experiences.longDesc: Protected wilderness with scenic hiking trails, native forests, and panoramic island views, offering families an immersive nature adventure.
